content: this hood is worked from the bottom up and seamed at the top the ties are knit separately and then sewn on finished measurements height 14 length 62 materials premier® yarns bunny™ brights 100% polyester 3 5oz/100g 40m/43 yds 2183-17 iris 2 balls needles us size 15 10 mm straight or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle stitch markers coordinating smooth yarn for seaming like everyday worsted optional gauge 8 sts x 16 row = 4 in garter st save time check your gauge skills/techniques used in this pattern knit stitches kfb increases k2tog and ssk decreases seaming with whipstitch working with textured yarn
